definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: We consider him worthy of confidence .
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲他是値得信賴的。

sentences.english: Be able to understand the value of money on time and the concept of equivalence .
sentences.chinese: 瞭解金錢在時間上的價值與等値的觀念。

sentences.english: Of particular interest are the sharper differentials in income in Shanghai compared to Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 特別値得注意的是上海在所得上的差異比廣州更嚴重。

sentences.english: The assignment of orders of rank through valuation is done only in acting and through acting.
sentences.chinese: 靠評値來分等級，只有在行爲中而經由行爲才做得到。

definition: iteration mark (used to represent a duplicated character)
Japanese variant of 驅|驱/to gallop
to borrow/to buy on credit/to rent out
